mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DT_MEMBER (MEMBER_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_PHONE) VALUES (MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, TO_DATE(#{memberBirth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{memberPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT ADDRESS_NUMBER FROM ( SELECT ADDRESS_NUMBER FROM DT_ADDRESS ORDER BY ADDRESS_NUMBER DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DT_ADDRESS (ADDRESS_NUMBER, ADDRESS_POSTAL, ADDRESS_ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL) VALUES (ADDRESS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{addressPostal}, #{addressAddress}, #{addressDetail})
